However, 16% of traders plan to enter the crypto market this year and 13% are already active in trading cryptocurrencies. Inflation and tariffs are the most significant factors likely to influence markets in 2025, followed closely by rising geopolitical tensions. 41% of respondents identified market volatility as the primary challenge for trading.

articles.title: Elon Musk's six baby-faced DOGE engineers dismantling US government

articles.summary: Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) has brought in six young engineers to help him dismantle US government agencies. They include Akash Bobba, 21, Edward Coristine, 19, Luke Farritor, 23, Gautier Cole Killian, 24, Gavin Kliger, 25 and Ethan Shaotran, 22. They are taking control of key chokepoints including the Treasury Department's payments system, the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) and General Services Administration (GSA).
